source_objects.title: Arts & Crafts
source_objects.description: From quilting to cake decorating, crafting inspiration to art instruction, welcome to the ultimate place for courses in arts & crafts.

items.title: Learn to paint tiny houses using watercolor and gouache
items.headline: Learn to paint basic watercolor techniques and gouache painting in a fun way while painting tiny houses!
objectives_summary: Learn to work from direct references and images
Learn basing watercolor techniques like wash and color mixing
learn to paint with opaque gouache to give details

items.title: Chip Carving with a Flat Chisel
items.headline: Use very simple and affordable tools to make striking art pieces
objectives_summary: A technique of chip carving using only a flat bench chisel
How to anticipate the correct cut based on the grain direction

items.title: How To Draw BUILDINGS For Kids

visible_instructors.job_title: Illustrator and Instructor at How To Draw Comics . net
visible_instructors.name: Ed
visible_instructors.title: Ed Foychuk

items.headline: Building fundamentals for beginners
objectives_summary: Basic Drawing Principles
Basics of Linear Perspective
How To Draw Buildings

items.title: Vivid & Colorful Skies in Gouache and Watercolor

visible_instructors.title: Amy Stewart
visible_instructors.name: Amy
visible_instructors.job_title: New York Times Bestselling Author & Artist

items.headline: For Travel Sketching and Landscapes
objectives_summary: How to create a transparent layer of sky color
How to paint vivid clouds in watercolor or gouache
How to paint quickly and loosely when painting from life

items.title: Beginning Lampwork Glass Beads 101
items.headline: Basic Bead Shapes
objectives_summary: The student will learn how to make lampwork glass beads.
This is a class for beginners and we will learn preparation, safety techniques, and how to make some basic bead shapes.

items.title: Realism Studies Masterclass
items.headline: Rendering Different Materials (Digital Art)
objectives_summary: Create a fully rendered realistic still life digital painting
Render different materials like wood, metal, fur, textile, latex and more

items.title: Bird Watercolour Painting - How To Paint a Realistic Puffin
items.headline: Learn how to paint an amazing Puffin bird in watercolour step by step. Let me guide you through various techniques.
objectives_summary: Learn to paint this Puffin while you are guided step by step through a range of watercolour techniques.
This video takes you through the whole process of painting this striking Puffin using very fine detailed watercolour techniques.
Learn how to paint white feathers

items.title: Unleash Your Confident, Creative & Artistic Self, Go For It!
items.headline: Unlock your artistic potential, break the rules creatively and harness the power of expressive art and free thinking.
objectives_summary: Creativity
Drawing
Acrylic Painting

items.title: Easy Watercolor Exotic Bird in Loose Style
items.headline: Watercolor Free for beginners
objectives_summary: You will get how to paint Exotic bird in Watercolor

items.title: Kintsugi Course4  How to repair large chips
items.headline: Learn full-scale Kintsugi work
objectives_summary: How to repair large chips(Gold Powder / Keshi-shiage method)
Experience traditional Kintsugi work　伝統的な金継ぎの作業を体験できる
Those who Get an opportunity to experience Japanese culture　日本文化に触れる機会が得られる

items.title: Complete portrait drawing from beginner to advanced
items.headline: hyper realistic portrait drawing course
objectives_summary: Learn the basics of portrait painting
Hyper Realistic shading with charcoal and brushes
Draw hyper realistic with charcoals and brushes (eyes, eyebrows, eyelashes, nose, lips, ears, hair, hands, skin, beard, mustache, teeth, neck)

items.title: Byzantine Iconography Series 6: Drawing Seated Figures
items.headline: Drawing Seated, Reclining and Kneeling Figures
objectives_summary: Students will learn to draw the Enthoned Frontal seated figure
3/4 Seated Figure (Introduction to vertical or relative perspective)
Reclining Figure

items.title: Watercolor Mountains For Beginners
items.headline: Create 12 Different Mountain Landscapes!
objectives_summary: How to paint mountain landscapes in watercolor
How to use wet-in-wet techniques to paint water, grass, skies and mountains
How to loosen up your brushstrokes whilst maintaining detail

items.title: Scenery Oil Pastel Painting Lesson
items.headline: Paint-along art lesson
objectives_summary: Learn to paint without any line drawing.
Learn to paint from the heart.
I will teach you how to paint with confidence.

items.title: How To Draw Wild Animals Vol 5 - Hare, Fox and Mouse
items.headline: Learn how to draw 3 Wild Animal Pictures. Get AMAZING results with Pastel Pencils. Create art you can be proud of.
objectives_summary: How to use Pastel Pencil Techniques to Draw 3 Wild Animals
Apply the light to dark rule when layering pastel tones
Be able to apply the techniques learnt to their own pictures

items.title: How to Draw a Tiger
items.headline: with Colored Pencils on Grey Paper
objectives_summary: How to draw on grey paper to make your drawings pop
How to give depth and third dimension to your drawings
How to draw realistic fur with colored pencils
